message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a fair start.
Your offer was a bit too lopsided. Let's split it evenly and avoid wasting time.
I see you want even, but I came here to negotiate. Meet me in the middle of my first offer and even.
The clock is ticking, Alice.  I'm being more than fair - let's settle this now.
You're trying to rush me, but I'm not budging that much. Let's try a bit closer to my last offer.
Alice, we're halfway through. I'm making another concession, but this is as high as I'll go.  Let's be sensible and end this.
You say that's as high as you'll go, but I think there's still room to meet in the middle.
This is my final offer, Alice.  Take it or leave it - we both lose if this goes any further.
